# Visual Basic

> The Visual Basic programming language for .NET. Covers VB.NET syntax, language features, Windows Forms development, and migration from VB6. Provides a familiar syntax for developers from classic Visual Basic backgrounds.

- [Language Walkthroughs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/walkthroughs.md): Step-by-step instructions for common scenarios in Visual Basic development

## Topic Indices

- [Developing Applications](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/llms.txt): 3 topics, 97 in tree; Developing Applications documentation and reference.
- [Get started with Visual Basic](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/getting-started/llms.txt): 3 topics; Get started with Visual Basic documentation and reference.
- [Language Reference](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/llms.txt): 9 topics, 504 in tree; Language Reference documentation and reference.
- [Misc Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/misc/llms.txt): 1432 topics; Misc Docs documentation and reference.
- [Programming Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/llms.txt): 1 topics, 366 in tree; Programming Guide documentation and reference.
- [Reference Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/reference/llms.txt): 2 topics, 64 in tree; Reference Docs documentation and reference.
